where.label: wr2
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( si <* query ( pdr <* usedin ( self , 'electronic_assembly_interconnect_and_packaging_design.' + 'product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition' ) | pdr \ product_definition_relationship . name = 'shielded item' ) | 'electronic_assembly_interconnect_and_packaging_design.' + 'component_definition' in typeof ( si . relating_product_definition ) ) ) >= 1

where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( pdr <* usedin ( self , 'electronic_assembly_interconnect_and_packaging_design.' + 'property_definition_relationship.related_property_definition' ) | ( ( 'electronic_assembly_interconnect_and_packaging_design.' + 'component_definition' in typeof ( pdr . relating_property_definition ) ) or ( 'electronic_assembly_interconnect_and_packaging_design.' + 'component_shape_aspect' in typeof ( pdr . relating_property_definition ) ) ) and ( pdr \ property_definition_relationship . name = 'shielded item' ) ) ) >= 1
